sources.title: 1941 Wetterleuchten Um Barbara ( Sybille Schmitz, Viktor Staal, Attila Hörbiger, Oscar Sima, Georg Vogelsang)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1941. Wetterleuchten um Barbara.  U.a mit Sybille Schmitz und Viktor Staal

metadata.Plot: After an Austrian home guard raids a group of pro Nazi mountain folk, Barbara and her husband ,part of the group, escape to Germany, from which they will return with invading troops to establish closer ties between the two countries.
metadata.Actors: Sybille Schmitz, Attila Hörbiger, Maria Koppenhöfer
